Publications

Publications and Abstracts

  • C Zhao, Y Li, Z Safhikani, B Haibe-Kains, A Goldenberg. (2015) Integrating in vitro and ex vivo data to improve drug response predictions in clinical trials. In review at Genome Medicine.
  • P Smirnov, Z Safikhani, N El-Hachem, D Wang, A She, C Olsen, M Freeman, H Selby, D Gendoo, P Grossman, A Beck, H Aerts, M Lupien, A Goldenberg, B Haibe-Kains. (2015) PharmacoGx: an R package for analysis of large pharmacogenomics datasets. In submission to Bioinformatics.
  • C Corre, G Shinoda, H Zhu, DL Cousminer, C Crossman, C Bellissimo, A Goldenberg, GQ Daley, MR Palmart. (2015) Sex specific regulation of weight and puberty by Lin28/let-7 axis. In submission to the Journal of Endocrinology.
  • R. Colak, T. Kim, H Kazan, Y Oh, M Cruz, A Valladares, J Peralta, J Escobedo, E Parra, P.M. Kim and A. Goldenberg (2015) JBASE: Joint Bayesian Analysis of Sub-phenotypes and Epistasis. Bioinformatics.
  • Saria, S., A. Goldenberg (2015). Subtyping: What it is and its role in precision medicine. IEEE Intelligent Systems Magazine. 30(4). pp 70-75.
  • D Hidru and A Goldenberg (2014) EquiNMF: Graph Regularized Multiview Nonnegative Matrix Factorization. Workshop on Machine Learning in Computational Biology co-located with NIPS
  • A.M. Mezlini, C. Baciu, S. Morrissy, M. Taylor, D. Malkin, A. Goldenberg (2014) Quantity or quality that is the question: integrative genome-wide association. In Proceedings of the ASHG Conference
  • B Wang, A Mezlini, F Demir, M Fiume, T Zu, M Brudno, B Haibe-Kains and A Goldenberg (2014) Similarity network fusion for aggregating data types on a genomic scale. Nature Methods. Online Jan 26
  • A Mezlini, B Wang, A Deshwar, Q Morris and A Goldenberg (2013) Identifying cancer specific functionally relevant miRNAs from gene expression and miRNA-to-gene networks using regularized regression. PloS One, 8(10).
  • Y Li, A Goldenberg, K Wong, Z Zhang (2013) A probabilistic approach to explore human microRNA targetome by integrating microRNA-overexpression data and sequence information. Bioinformatics
  • A M Mezlini, E JM Smith, M Fiume, O Buske, G Savich, S Shah, S Aparicion, D Chiang, A Goldenberg and M Brudno (2013) iReckon: Simultaneous isoform discovery and abundance estimation from RNA-seq data. Genome Research.
  • B Wang and A Goldenberg (2012) Local Diffusion and Cluster Score (LDCS) for Disease Subtyping. Electronic proceeds of the workshop on Machine Learning in Computational Biology, collocated w/ NIPS
  • Mostafavi S, Goldenberg A, Morris Q (2012) Labeling Nodes Using Three Degrees of Propagation. PLoS ONE 7(12): e51947. doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0051947
  • M.Alshalalfa, G. Bader, A. Goldenberg, Q. Morris, R. Alhajj (2012) Detecting microRNAs of high influence on protein functional interaction networks: a prostate cancer case study. BMC Systems Biology 6(1): 112
  • B.Wang, A. Mezlini and A. Goldenberg (2012) Combining multiple biological domains using patient network fusion. In Proceedings of the Machine Learning in Genetics and Genomics Workshop co-located with ICML
  • D.Warde-Farley, M. Brudno, Q. Morris, A Goldenberg (2012) Sub-phenotype Modeling in GWAS. In Proceedings of the Pacific Symposium on Biocomputing
  • A Goldenberg, S Mostafavi, G Quon, P Boutros, and Q Morris. (2011) Unsupervised detection of genes of influence in lung cancer using biological networks. Bioinformatics.
  • A Goldenberg and A Zheng (2006) Exploratory Study of a New Model for Evolving Networks, Lecture Notes in Computer Science, Vol 4503.
  • A Goldenberg, D Warde-Farley, M. Brudno, Q. Morris (2010) Mixture model for sub-phenotyping. Electronic proceedings of the workshop on Machine Learning in Computational Biology, collocated with NIPS
  • S Mostafavi, A Goldenberg, and Q Morris. (2010) Predicting Node Labels in Large Networks. Electronic Proceedings of the Workshop on Networks Across Disciplines: Theory and Applications
  • S Mostafavi, A Goldenberg and Q Morris. (2010) Predicting Node Characteristics from Molecular Networks. Chapter in Network Biology: Methods and Protocols, Springer
  • A Goldenberg, A Zheng, S Fienberg and E Airoldi (2009) A Survey of Statistical Network Models, Foundations and Trends in Machine Learning, Vol 2 (2): pp 129-233
  • A Goldenberg (2007) Scalable Graphical Models for Social Networks. PhD Thesis.
  • A Goldenberg and A Zheng (2006) Exploratory Study of a New Model for Evolving Networks, Lecture Notes in Computer Science, Vol 4503.
  • A Goldenberg and A Moore (2005) Bayes Net Graphs to Understand Coauthorship Networks, KDD Workshop on Link Discovery: Issues, Approaches and Applications.
  • A Goldenberg and A Moore (2004) Tractable Learning of Large Bayes Net Structures from Sparse Data, Proceedings of the Twenty First International Conference on Machine Learning.
  • A Goldenberg, J Kubica, P Komarek, A Moore and J Schneider (2003) A Comparison of Statistical and Machine Learning Algorithms on the Task of Link Completion, KDD Workshop on Link Analysis for Detecting Complex Behavior.
  • A Goldenberg and A Moore (2003) Empirical Bayes Screening for Link Analysis, Workshop on Text Analysis and Link Detection, International Joint Conference on Artificial Intelligence
  • A Goldenberg, G Shmueli, R Caruana and S Fienberg (2002) Early statistical detection of anthrax outbreaks by tracking over-the-counter medication sales, PNAS, 99, 5237 - 5240.
  • P Yu, A Goldenberg and Z Bi (2001) Time Series Forecasting Using Wavelets with Predictor-Corrector Boundary Treatment, KDD Workshop on Temporal Data Mining.
  • M Kantardzic, A Goldenberg, T Howe and P Fagey (2001) Artificial Neural Network Approach to Data Analysis and Parameter Estimation in Experimental Spectroscopy, Informatica, Vol 25, 1926.
